EmailTemplate.description: Case Assigned Notification to Owner in Korean
EmailTemplate.name: Case Assigned - Internal (ko)
EmailTemplate.subject: Case has been assigned to you - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
안녕하세요 {!Case.OwnerFirstName}님, 케이스 #{!Case.CaseNumber}는 {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} ({!User.Email})에 의해 당신에게 배정되었습니다. 케이스를 확인하려면 아래를 클릭합니다: {!Case.Link}
{!Case.Thread_Id}
